name: jenkins-dummy
description: Dummy app to test jenkins pipeline files

scripts.build:auth: cd auth && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:user_details: cd user_details && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:product_details: cd product_details && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD | grep -q -E '^(auth|user_details|product_details)/' && npm run build:auth && npm run build:user_details && npm run build:product_details || (git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD | grep -q -E '^auth/' && npm run build:auth) || (git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD | grep -q -E '^user_details/' && npm run build:user_details) || (git diff --name-only HEAD~1 HEAD | grep -q -E '^product_details/' && npm run build:product_details)
